CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1964, pg. 15 reads: "Sweethearts All! - While charming Miss Vivian Robinson (center) was crowned queen of the Sweethearts Contest, given in connection with the testimonial for Mrs. Margaret Cauley, at Brown Chapel, recently, you surely will agree that these contestants are "sweethearts, all." They are (left to right) Jayne Ray, Malvee Turner, Miss Robinson, who reported $212.50 to win the title; Dorothy Brown and Evelyn Gregory. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sweethearts contest contestants, from left: Jayne Ray, Malvee Turner, "Queen" Vivian Robinson, Dorothy Brown, and Evelyn Gregory, posed in Brown Chapel AME Church for Margaret Cauley testimonial
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Pittsburgh, Pa)Crowns--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
